step1.title: EntityType

step1.heading: Step 1: EntityType Generation

items: Attribute Schema - Relevant fields for extraction
Search Focus - event_attendance, pain_points, contacts, etc.

step2.title: Category
step2.subtitle: AI Prompt & Search Terms
step2.heading: Step 2: Category Generation
step2.description: The AI creates a Category with:
items: AI Extraction Prompt - Tailored for the request
Search Terms - Expanded (e.g. "decision maker" → mayor, district administrator, etc.)
Link to EntityType - Extracted data is saved as entities

step3.title: Crawl Config
step3.subtitle: URL Filters
step3.heading: Step 3: Crawl Configuration
items: Data Source Linking - Based on geographic filter (e.g. NRW)
